General.Name: Associated Alcohols & Breweries Ltd.
General.Description: Associated Alcohols & Breweries Limited engages in liquor manufacturing, distillation, and bottling activities in India and internationally. It offers extra neutral alcohol, as well as Indian Made Indian Liquor and Indian Made Foreign Liquor in the categories of whisky, brandy, rum, gin, and vodka; and rectified spirit and hand sanitizers. The company's brands include Central Province Whisky, Titanium Triple Distilled Vodka, Bombay Special Whisky, Desi Madira Masala, Superman Fine Whisky, James Mc Gill Whisky, and Jamaican Magic Rum, as well as various franchise and licensed brands. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Indore, India.
